name: LXC farm manager
tagline: User interface terminal UI LXC python3 linux container manager
body:
# Compact and secure tool for managing LXC containers.

Using **lxc-ui.py** you can:
 
* navigate through list of containers
* create
* stop
* destroy
* freeze
* unfreeze
* connect to terminal
* rename
* clone 

containers.
UI is created using curses library and looks almost like midnight commander.

### It can be used on server with very strict security policy. When external access is not allowed.  


## INSTALATION

> apt-get update  
> apt-get install python3-lxc  
> apt-get install git  
> git clone https://github.com/pymag09/lxc-ui.git  
> sudo ./lxc-ui.py  

## ENVIRONMENT

Ubuntu is recommended for running lxc-ui.py.  
Tested on ubuntu 14.04. It has all that you need to run lxc manager in the repository.   

## IMPORTANT

If you have found any bugs please report them here: [Issues](https://github.com/pymag09/lxc-ui/issues)  
All previous commits are here: [Commits](https://github.com/pymag09/lxc-ui/commits/master)  
In case of serious problem with bugs don't hesitate to switch to previous commit
